alert.note: Alert for Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:10PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR RANDOLPH AND STE. GENEVIEVE COUNTIES... At 409 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Rocky Ridge to near Womac, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bloomsdale, Weingarten, Ste. Genevieve, St. Mary, Evansville, Chester, Baldwin, Sparta and Bremen. This also includes Hawn State Park and Felix Valle House State Park. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 141 and 157. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
